title: Harduf
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine
description: This vegetarian restaurant in the Haifa area is part of Kibbutz Harduf. Offers home-style cooking with many vegan items, such as breakfast, almond pancakes, Indian dish, salads, soups, stuffed vegetables. Offers view of the Galil mountains. Intimate atmosphere. Several deals for couples.
